title: GOOD LUCK CLOUD9 IN IEM VS GE TIGERS
body: give cloud 9 nine bans vs tigers for a chance pls

replies.body:
Actually IEM Starts on the 12th. 
The LoL segment of IEM is on the 13th. ;)

StarCraft 2, DotA 2, Battlefield 4, CS:GO etc are also events that happen at IEM Katowice.

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=HPLhX5Vh,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-12T16:17:48.600+0000)
>
> Actually IEM Starts on the 12th. 
> The LoL segment of IEM is on the 13th. ;)
> 
> StarCraft 2, DotA 2, Battlefield 4, CS:GO etc are also events that happen at IEM Katowice.

My bad, thanks. I was just thinking of the lol times. Also, I didn't know they had a battlefield segment, cool.
HOW DO I ACTUALLY WATCH THE MATCHES FOR LEAGUE IN IEM

It will be on LoL ESports.

Friday – March 13th

13:00 to 14:00 CET - Group A - Cloud9 vs GE Tigers (BO1)
14:10 to 15:10 CET - Group A - SK Gaming vs yoe Flash Wolves (BO1)
15:20 to 16:20 CET - Group A - Winners Match (BO1)
16:30 to 17:30 CET - Group A - Elimination Match (BO1)
17:40 to 18:40 CET - Group B - Gambit Gaming vs CJ Entus (BO1)
18:50 to 19:50 CET - Group B - Team SoloMid vs Team WE (BO1)
20:00 to 21:00 CET - Group B - Winners' Match (BO1)
21:10 to 22:10 CET - Group B - Elimination Match (BO1)
Saturday – March 14th

13:00 to 14:00 CET Group A - Decider Match (BO1)
14:10 to 15:10 CET Group B - Decider Match (BO1)
15:30 to 18:30 CET - Semifinal #1 (BO3)
18:45 to 21:45 CET - Semifinal #2 (BO3)
Sunday – March 15th

18:00 to 22:30 CET - Final (BO5)

It's extremely hard to ban out GE.
They could run the Juggermaw comp that Prey just dominates with.

Lulu can shut down a couple of comps they can run. 
But not all.
